com.microsoft.rest.serializer

Class JacksonConverterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrofit2.Converter.Factory
      • com.microsoft.rest.serializer.JacksonConverterFactory

  • public final class JacksonConverterFactory
extends retrofit2.Converter.Factory
    A similar implementation of retrofit2.converter.jackson.JacksonConverterFactory which supports polymorphism.
